lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Angels ace Garrett Richards is expected to need surgery to repair a torn ligament in his right elbow, sidelining him into next season.

headline.print_headline: Angels Ace Garrett Richards Likely Needs Major Elbow Surgery
headline.main: Angels Ace Garrett Richards Likely Needs Major Elbow Surgery

snippet: Los Angeles Angels ace Garrett Richards is expected to need surgery to repair a torn ligament in his right elbow, sidelining him into next season....
